casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Larry James ATKINS. No. 500P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. John Keating Wiles, Raleigh, for Larry James Atkins.

C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of December 2008 by State of NC to Deem Response Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
